    Function reference

    Data preparation

    Use these functions to prepare or simulate choice data.

    prepare()
    Prepare empirical choice data.
    simulate()
    Simulate choice data.
    overview_effects()
    Overview of effects.
    summary(<RprobitB_data>)
    Summary method for RprobitB_data.

    Model estimation

    Use these function to estimate a probit model.

    mcmc()
    Perform Markov chain Monte Carlo simulation for fitting a (latent class) (mixed) (multinomial) probit model.
    transform()
    Change the length of the burn-in period, the thinning factor and the scale after Gibbs sampling.

    Model evaluation

    Use these functions to evaluate your model.

    summary(<RprobitB_model>)
    Summary method for RprobitB_model.
    plot(<RprobitB_model>)
    Plot method for RprobitB_model.
    compare()
    Compare fitted models.
    predict()
    Predict choices.
    choice_probs()
    Compute choice probabilities of an RprobitB_model.
    classify()
    Classify deciders.
    compute_log_likelihood()
    Compute log-likelihood of an RprobitB_model.

    S3 classes

    These functions construct the S3 classes of RprobitB.

    RprobitB_data()
    Create object of class RprobitB_data.
    RprobitB_gibbs_samples_statistics()
    Create object of class RprobitB_gibbs_samples_statistics.
    RprobitB_latent_classes()
    Create object of class RprobitB_latent_classes.
    RprobitB_model()
    Create object of class RprobitB_model.
    RprobitB_normalization()
    Create object of class RprobitB_normalization.
    RprobitB_parameter()
    Create object of class RprobitB_parameter.

    Small utilities

    These functions may be useful beyond RprobitB.

    R_hat()
    Compute Gelman-Rubin statistic.
    delta()
    Matrix difference operator.
    is_covariance_matrix()
    Check covariance matrix properties.
    rdirichlet()
    Draw from Dirichlet
    rwishart()
    Draw from a Wishart
    set_mfrow()
    Balancing visualization of multiple figures.

    Internal functions

    These functions are not user-level.

    check_distr()
    Check distr.
    check_form()
    Check form.
    check_prior()
    Check prior.
    compute_choice_probabilities()
    Compute probit choice probabilities for a single choice situation.
    compute_point_estimates()
    Compute point estimates of an RprobitB_model.
    compute_sufficient_statistics()
    Compute sufficient statistics.
    create_labels_Omega()
    Create labels for Omega.
    create_labels_Sigma()
    Create labels for Sigma.
    create_labels_alpha()
    Create labels for alpha.
    create_labels_b()
    Create labels for b.
    create_labels_s()
    Create labels for s.
    create_parameter_labels()
    Create parameters labels.
    filter_gibbs_samples()
    Filter Gibbs samples.
    gibbs_sampling()
    Gibbs sampler.
    plot_acf()
    Autocorrelation plot of Gibbs samples.
    plot_effects()
    Visualizing the linear effects.
    plot_mixture_contour()
    Plotting mixing distribution contours.
    plot_mixture_marginal()
    Plotting marginal mixing distributions.
    plot_trace()
    Visualizing the trace of Gibbs samples.
    preference_flip()
    Check for flip in preferences after change in model scale.
    set_initial_gibbs_values()
    Set initial values for the Gibbs sampler.
    transform_gibbs_samples()
    Transformation of Gibbs samples.
    transform_parameter()
    Transformation of parameter values.
    undiff_Sigma()
    Transform differenced to non-differenced error term covariance matrix.
    print(<RprobitB_data>)
    Print method for RprobitB_data.
    print(<RprobitB_gibbs_samples_statistics>)
    Print method for RprobitB_gibbs_samples_statistics.
    print(<RprobitB_latent_classes>)
    Print method for RprobitB_latent_classes.
    print(<RprobitB_model>)
    Print method for RprobitB_model.
    print(<RprobitB_normalization>)
    Print method for RprobitB_normalization.
    print(<summary.RprobitB_data>)
    Print method for the summary of RprobitB_data.
    print(<summary.RprobitB_model>)
    Print method for the summary of RprobitB_model.
